Package io.helidon.webserver

Class StringContentReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.webserver.StringContentReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerRequest.Reader<String>, BiFunction<Flow.Publisher<RequestChunk>,Class<? super R>,CompletionStage<? extends R>>

    public class StringContentReader
extends Object
implements ServerRequest.Reader<String>
    The StringContentReader provides means to convert a ByteBuffer publisher to a single string while using a given charset. If the charset cannot be used by the JVM, the returned completion stage ends exceptionally with an IllegalArgumentException.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CompletionStage<String> apply​(Flow.Publisher<RequestChunk> publisher, Class<? super String> clazz)
      Converts a ByteBuffer publisher to a single string while using the associated charset.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public CompletionStage<String> apply​(Flow.Publisher<RequestChunk> publisher,
                                     Class<? super String> clazz)
        Converts a ByteBuffer publisher to a single string while using the associated charset. If the charset cannot be used by the JVM, the returned completion stage ends exceptionally with an IllegalArgumentException.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface BiFunction<Flow.Publisher<RequestChunk>,Class<? super R>,CompletionStage<? extends R>>
        Specified by:
        apply in interface ServerRequest.Reader<String>
        Parameters:
        publisher - the publisher from which to transform the byte chunks into a single string
        clazz - the requested type to be returned as a completion stage. The purpose of this parameter is to know what the user of this Reader actually requested.
        Returns:
        a completion stage representing the to be created string; if the associated charset cannot be used by this JVM, it ends exceptionally with an IllegalArgumentException
